text: Koraa, ‘tomaloke allahara paraibarte yiboraka ahbana karaa, se'i ansibilakara katha ketiyaba bhabi ca'ichane? Sihamte prthiraita kiba srsti karaiche yadi moka dekhuraacona; athaba akasasamuhara srstita sihamtara kono ansa achene barau? Na'iba ami sihamtaka ene kono kitaba dicho neki yara pramanara oparata sihamte nirbhara karae’? Baram yalimasakale ijane sijanaka prataranara bahirae ana eko pratisrauti nidiye
